comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Create pathoverlay spanning the dateline / 180th meridian What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Path overlay line drawn on one side of mapview and wrapped wrong way around globe. This is similar to ussue 345 and 285 wheich effected iconoverlays. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1107 Please provide any additional information below.
This issue was closed by revision r1108.
